sentences.sContent: Many toys have no attraction beyond their novelty value.

sentences.sContent: It was fun for a while, but the novelty wore off (= it became boring ).
sentences.sCn: 开始有一阵很好玩，可是新鲜感随后便消失了。

words.tran: 契约的代替；用新事物代替
